title: Wales v South Africa, Rugby World Cup 2019 player ratings: Who shone and who struggled?
text:
More semi-final heartbreak for Wales, eight years on from their 2011 loss to France. It came down to a single Handre Pollard penalty, but South Africa are through to another Rugby World Cup final.

Here's how the two teams fared in a dull match in Yokohama.

Wales

15. Leigh Halfpenny

Couple of outstanding catches under the high ball. Tackled Le Roux in the air to give up a penalty but this was a fine effort from the forgotten man at full-back. 6

14. George North

Not the same player and as he admitted, searching for form. Unable to convert some key breaks and then cruelly forced off with a hamstring injury in the first half. 5

13. Jonathan Davies

Vital to have him back and instantly gave Wales more...
description: More semi-final heartbreak for Wales, eight years on from their 2011 loss to France.
